name: Eyes of Ra
description:
This was my capstone project for my senior year at The New Jersey Institute of Technology. This project was sponsored by the Biomedical Research Facility with the intent to create a game that could be used as an alternative physical therapy for an eye disorder called convergence insufficiency.  To complete this project we had to not only stick to mechanics that would force the player to work specific eye muscles, we also had to integrate it with a patented technology that would use the users eye movements for controls. In the middle of the players reticle there is an object called a "gabor patch". The ultimate objective of the player was to line up the gabor patch with the one located on the oncoming enemy with their eyes to destroy it.
